Web3 Projects

These are the projects that I got involved in the web3 space...

SparkPoint Wallet

A non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet where you can send, receive, and store BTC, ETH, SRK, SFUEL, other ERC-20 & BEP-20 tokens and your NFTs with ease & confidence.

MetaSaga Warriors

Roguelike dungeon-crawler free-to-own NFT game by MetaGaming Guild.

SparkSwap DEX

A decentralized exchange where you can instantly swap multiple cryptocurrencies in a trustless and decentralized manner. Earn from the transaction fees when the user provides liquidity.

SparkLaunch

A launchpad platform for launching transformative cryptocurrency projects to distribute tokens and increase liquidity.

SparkSwap Staking Pool

SparkSwap's staking platform where you can stake your tokens and earn tokens as a reward. Farm Staking and Pool Staking.

SparkBridge

A Cross-blockchain bridging for transferring Ethereum ERC-20 SRK to Binance Smart Chain as BEP-20 SRKb tokens and vice versa.

SparkRewards

A bountry and airdrop platform for the SparkPoint Community.

MetaGaming Guild Website

Checked and tested the official Website of MGG.

MGG GameFi Vaults

A platform where MGG holders can stake their token in the vault for a fix period of time and earn a reward as a return. MGG acquires the best gaming assets and puts them in a vault where MGG holders can earn through staking.

MetaGaming Pad

A platform where users can acquire early access to the incoming P2E Games in the Metaverse. An IGO and INO Launchpad for exciting GameFi projects

Filipino Web3 Community Builders

Working as a Community Manager and part of the core team. This community is the Central Hub for Filipino Web3 Community Builders and Developers.

Genesis Wolves NFT

Genesis Wolves is an NFT project. I am currently handling the moderation of their discord server.
